item.title: 【Unit Integration Testing With Testcontainers Docker Compose】使用 Testcontainers Docker Compose 进行单元集成测试
item.description:
【

Is your test dependent on multiple other applications and do you want to create an integration test using Testcontainers? Then the Testcontainers Docker Compose Module is the solution. In this blog, you will learn how convenient it is to create an integration test using multiple Testcontainers. Enjoy!

Introduction

Using Testcontainers is a very convenient way to write a unit integration test. Most of the time, you will use it in order to test the integration with a database, a message bus, etc. But what if your application interacts with an application that consists of multiple containers? How can you add these containers to your unit integration test? The answer is quite simple: you should use the Docker Compose Module.

】

您的测试是否依赖于多个其他应用程序，并且您想使用测试容器创建集成测试吗？那么 Testcontainers Docker Compose 模块就是解决方案。在本博客中，您将了解使用多个测试容器创建集成测试是多么方便。享受吧！

简介

使用 Testcontainers 是编写单元集成测试的一种非常方便的方法。大多数时候，您将使用它来测试与数据库、消息总线等的集成。但是，如果您的应用程序与由多个容器组成的应用程序交互怎么办？如何将这些容器添加到单元集成测试中？答案非常简单：您应该使用 Docker Compose 模块。

item.title: 【Java 23: What Developers Need to Know】Java 23：开发人员需要了解什么
item.description:
【

As Java implements its 23rd major release on September 17, 2024, developers are in for a treat with many new features and improvements. Oracle's latest release promises to make development more efficient and enjoyable while enhancing the platform's performance, stability, and security. Let's dive into the key aspects developers should be excited about in Java 23.

The Six-Month Release Cadence Continues

Oracle is sticking to its six-month release cycle for Java, now in its seventh year. This approach has successfully delivered regular updates and innovations to the Java ecosystem. A Long-Term Support (LTS) version is released every two years, providing stability for enterprises that prefer less frequent updates. Java 23 marks the 14th release in this six-month cadence.

】

随着 Java 于 2024 年 9 月 17 日实现第 23 个主要版本，开发人员将迎来一个处理许多新功能和改进。 Oracle 的最新版本承诺使开发更加高效和愉快，同时增强平台的性能、稳定性和安全性。让我们深入探讨 Java 23 中开发人员应该感到兴奋的关键方面。

六个月的发布节奏仍在继续

Oracle 坚持 Java 的六个月发布周期，现在已经是第七个年头了。 这种方法成功地为 Java 生态系统提供了定期更新和创新。长期支持 (LTS) 版本每两年发布一次，为不喜欢频繁更新的企业提供稳定性。 Java 23 是这六个月周期中的第 14 个版本。

item.title: 【Transforming Manufacturing: AI-Driven Quality Control and Predictive Maintenance Using Cloud and IoT】制造业转型：利用云和物联网进行人工智能驱动的质量控制和预测性维护
item.description:
【

In modern manufacturing, the key to sustaining product reliability, compliance with regulatory standards, and maintaining operational efficiency lies in robust quality control and advanced maintenance management. This study delves into the integration of AI technologies to interpret sensor data from production equipment. By employing predictive modeling techniques such as Stacked LSTM networks, RNNs, Random Forests, Gradient Boosting, SVM, ARIMA, and SARIMA, the goal is to forecast potential equipment failures, implement proactive maintenance solutions, and uphold rigorous quality checks through automated systems.

This research showcases how AI-driven insights can be displayed through interactive dashboards and comprehensive reports, aiding in meeting regulatory standards while substantially improving operational dependability in manufacturing. Beyond the immediate benefits of reduced downtime and increased productivity, anomaly detection, especially in rotating machinery, plays a pivotal role in AI-driven predictive maintenance (PdM). The findings highlight how predictive modeling transforms equipment management, fostering innovation and supporting sustainability across various industries by utilizing sensors, cameras, and laser beam sensing technology.

】

在现代制造业中，维持产品可靠性、符合监管标准和保持运营效率的关键在于强大的质量控制和先进的维护管理。这项研究深入探讨了人工智能技术的集成，以解释来自生产设备的传感器数据。通过采用堆叠 LSTM 网络、RNN、随机森林、梯度提升、SVM、ARIMA 和 SARIMA 等预测建模技术，目标是预测潜在的设备故障，实施主动维护解决方案，并通过自动化系统进行严格的质量检查。< /p>

这项研究展示了如何通过交互式仪表板和综合报告显示人工智能驱动的见解，帮助满足监管标准，同时大幅提高制造中的运营可靠性。除了减少停机时间和提高生产率等直接好处之外，异常检测（尤其是旋转机械中的异常检测）在人工智能驱动的预测性维护 (PdM) 中发挥着关键作用。研究结果强调了预测建模如何利用传感器、摄像头和激光束传感技术来改变设备管理、促进创新并支持各个行业的可持续发展。

item.title: 【AWS LetsEncrypt Lambda or Why I Wrote a Custom TLS Provider for AWS Using OpenTofu and Go】AWS LetsEncrypt Lambda 或为什么我使用 OpenTofu 和 Go 为 AWS 编写自定义 TLS 提供程序
item.description:
【

These days, it's challenging to imagine systems that have public API endpoints without TLS certificate protection. There are several ways to issue certificates:

  • Paid wildcard certificates that can be bought from any big TLS provider
  • Paid root certificates that sign all downstream certificates that are issued by corporate PKI systems
  • Free certificates issued by TLS providers like LetsEncrypt or AWS Certificate Manager
  • Self-signed certificates, issued by OpenSSL or another tool

Within the context of this post, I will mainly discuss free certificates that can be used inside of AWS, but not only by AWS services. Clearly, using anything other than AWS Certificate Manager makes no sense if you exclusively use managed AWS services and don't have strict security requirements. AWS Certificate Manager offers a very convenient and speedy method of issuing certificates via DNS or HTTP challenges; however, you face basic AWS limitations if you need to use these certificates outside of AWS services (API Gateway, ALB, NLB, etc.), such as an EC2 instance running Nginx that needs a physical certificate file. Additionally, even if you request it, AWS Certificate Manager does not display the certificate content.

】

如今，很难想象具有公共 API 端点而没有 TLS 证书保护的系统。颁发证书有多种方式：

  • 可以从任何大型 TLS 提供商处购买付费通配符证书
  • 付费根证书，用于签署企业 PKI 系统颁发的所有下游证书
  • 由 LetsEncrypt 或 AWS Certificate Manager 等 TLS 提供商颁发的免费证书
  • 自签名证书，由 OpenSSL 或其他工具颁发
    < br>

在本文中，我将主要讨论可在 AWS 内部使用的免费证书，但不仅限于 AWS 服务。显然，如果你专门使用托管AWS服务并且没有严格的安全要求。 AWS Certificate Manager 提供了一种非常方便快捷的方法，通过 DNS 或 HTTP 质询来颁发证书；但是，如果您需要在 AWS 服务（API Gateway、ALB、NLB 等）之外使用这些证书，例如运行 Nginx 的 EC2 实例需要物理证书文件，您将面临基本的 AWS 限制。此外，即使您请求，AWS Certificate Manager 也不会显示证书内容。

item.title: 【Misconfiguration Madness: Thwarting Common Vulnerabilities in the Financial Sector】错误配置的疯狂：阻止金融部门的常见漏洞
item.description:
【

Ever since people started putting their money into banks and financial institutions, other people have sought to steal those deposits or otherwise fraudulently obtain those protected assets. When someone asked infamous 1920s-era bank robber Willie Sutton why he robbed banks, he simply replied, “Because that’s where the money is.” 

Today, much of the money held by banks and other financial institutions is in digital form, and many of the sensitive records held by those firms can be just as valuable as the digital currency itself. But the reasons behind the targeting of financial institutions by threat actors remain much the same as they were in Sutton’s time over 100 years ago: that’s where the money — and at least some valuable personal data — is kept.

】

自从人们开始将钱存入银行和金融机构以来，其他人就一直试图窃取这些存款或以其他方式欺诈性地获取这些受保护的资产。当有人问臭名昭著的 20 年代银行抢劫犯 威利·萨顿为什么要抢劫银行，他简单地回答道：“因为钱就在那里。” 

如今，银行和其他金融机构持有的大部分资金都是数字形式，这些公司持有的许多敏感记录可能与数字货币本身一样有价值。但威胁行为者瞄准金融机构的原因与 100 多年前萨顿时代的情况大致相同：那是资金（以及至少一些有价值的个人数据）的保存场所。

item.title: 【Hyperscale Data Centers Ignite Construction Surge】超大规模数据中心引发建设热潮
item.description:
【

Despite the lack of a universal definition for hyperscale data centers, many people view them as massive facilities that typically handle mission-critical workloads distributed across numerous servers. These buildings have collectively contributed to a data center construction boom, emphasizing the world’s substantial and growing dependence on technologies and the infrastructure supporting them.

Emerging Technologies Spurring Data Center Construction

When a February 2024 study examined the state of the global data center industry, the results revealed some of the primary drivers of the current construction boom. One finding was many of the largest hyperscale providers increasingly accommodate clients’ artificial intelligence applications and other computing-intensive requirements.

】

尽管超大规模数据中心缺乏通用定义< /a>，许多人将它们视为大型设施，通常处理分布在众多服务器上的关键任务工作负载。这些建筑共同推动了数据中心建设热潮，凸显了世界对技术及其支持基础设施的日益依赖。

新兴技术推动数据中心建设

2024 年 2 月的一项研究调查了全球数据中心行业的状况，结果揭示了当前建设热潮的一些主要驱动因素。一项发现是，许多最大的超大规模提供商越来越多地满足客户的人工智能应用程序和其他计算密集型需求。
